thread.title: ASU hockey opens NCAA era with huge win over U of A
thread.title_full: ASU hockey opens NCAA era with huge win over U of A

title: ASU hockey opens NCAA era with huge win over U of A
text:
ASU hockey opens NCAA era with huge win over U of A ASU beat Arizona 8-1 in the Sun Devils first game as a NCAA D1 program. Post to Facebook ASU hockey opens NCAA era with huge win over U of A ASU beat Arizona 8-1 in the Sun Devils first game as a NCAA D1 program.   12news.com: http://12ne.ws/1Lb92mp   Join the Conversation To   ASU hockey opens NCAA era with huge win over U of A Robby Baker , 12 Sports 11:33 p.m. MST October 3, 2015 ASU opens NCAA era with win over U of A KPNX Head Coach Greg Powers says he hopes the crowd doubles in size for ASU's next game at Gila River Arena. ASU beats U of A on the ice (Photo: 12 Sports) CONNECT 4 TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
Arizona State hockey's upcoming season will be a first for the program, but Saturday night was more of the same for the Sun Devils. 
ASU played their first game as a NCAA D1 program at Gila River Arena in front of a good-size crowd. In-state rival Arizona was the opponent, and just like that we had NCAA hockey in Arizona. 
The Sun Devils would roll to a 8-1 victory over the Wildcats, but it wasn't the score line that mattered on Saturday. 
History was made. 
The atmosphere in the arena was that of a NCAA program, and the Sun Devils lived up to it on the ice. 
"There was already a ton of crowd when we went out for warm ups and we thought it was going to be sweet. Then when we went out for the National Anthemâ€¦ you get chills down your spine," said defenseman Connor Schmidt. 
Saturday was bittersweet for ASU though, as it marked one of the last times the Sun Devils would face off against U of A. 
With ASU elevating to NCAA, there is only one scheduled meeting left later this year between the two schools. Read or Share this story: http://12ne.ws/1Lb92mp TOP VIDEOS
